AD_DarkUrgeSeesDeadChild.synopsis: Dark Urge sees a dead child after the destruction of the Den at the hands of goblins
AD_DarkUrgeSeesDeadChild.how_to_trigger: Trigger the attack on Den, let the goblins win.As Dark Urge, enter the hideout (S_DEN_HideoutArea_c4f9e65f-fc63-42b6-bd2e-eba70b24a700) and approach one of the children.

AD_DarkUrgeSeesDeadChild_0.text: Is this the first time I've caused a child's death?
